description.ruby-sapphire:
Lowers the foe’s accuracy
using smoke, ink, etc.
description.emerald:
Lowers the foe’s accuracy
using smoke, ink, etc.
description.firered-leafgreen:

of smoke or ink
reduces the foe’s
accuracy.
